intro: Indigofera nyikensis, commonly known as the Nyikénsis indigo plant, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the legume family, Fabaceae, and is characterized by its trifoliate leaves and small, pea-like flowers. The plant is known for its ability to fix atmospheric nitrogen, which enriches the soil and supports sustainable agriculture. It is also valued for its medicinal properties and has been used traditionally in various herbal remedies.
